name: Five Nights on the Toilet
storyline:
Help wanted at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! Recently rebranded from Fredbear's Family Diner, we're eager to get back to serving smiles and pizzas to children, but we need a janitor before moving forward. Apply now!

When you gotta go, you gotta go. Somehow, during your day here at Freddy's, you've wound up locked in a bathroom stall! And it houses the only working toilet! But you're not the only one who needs to go... Can you survive five nights on the toilet?
summary:
A comedy parody of the Five Nights at Freddy's indie horror series.

Survive five nights upon a toilet in a Freddy Fazbear's location, and find clues as to what's really happening that week.

Features first person sit and survive horror gameplay, with many levels, secrets, and challenges.

videos.title: Five Nights on the Toilet - 6/20 Mode Completed! 😂
